entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.8°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -11.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
